en.Alpinia Galanga (Rasna): Used to treat respiratory disorders, rheumatism, and digestive issues.
en.Amaranthus Viridis (Arive-Dantu): Used for wounds, inflammation, and respiratory problems.
en.Artocarpus Heterophyllus (Jackfruit): Used for diabetes, skin diseases, and infections.
en.Azadirachta Indica (Neem): Known for skin care, detoxification, and anti-inflammatory use.
en.Basella Alba (Basale): Has cooling effects; used for skin and digestive health.
en.Brassica Juncea (Indian Mustard): Used for joint pain and respiratory relief.
en.Carissa Carandas (Karanda): Used for anemia, indigestion, and fever.
en.Ficus Religiosa (Peepal Tree): Used for asthma and skin issues.
en.Hibiscus Rosa-sinensis: Supports hair growth and relieves high blood pressure.
en.Jasminum (Jasmine): Used for skin, stress relief, and antiseptic purposes.
en.Mangifera Indica (Mango): Used for digestion, diabetes, and infections.
en.Mentha (Mint): Aids digestion, relieves headaches, and cools the body.
en.Moringa Oleifera (Drumstick): Rich in nutrients; treats infections and inflammation.
en.Muntingia Calabura (Jamaica Cherry-Gasag: Used for respiratory issues and headaches.
en.Murraya Koenigii (Curry): Used for diabetes control and digestion.
en.Nyctanthes Arbor-tristis (Parijata): Used for fever, arthritis, and laxative effects.
en.Ocimum Tenuiflorum (Tulsi): Boosts immunity, fights infection, and reduces stress.
en.Plectranthus Amboinicus (Mexican Mint): Used for coughs and sore throats.
en.Pongamia Pinnata (Indian Beech): Applied to skin diseases and wounds.
en.Psidium Guajava (Guava): Used for diarrhea, infections, and diabetes.
en.Punica Granatum (Pomegranate): Rich in antioxidants and supports heart health.
en.Santalum Album (Sandalwood): Used in skincare and urinary treatment.
en.Syzygium Cumini (Jamun): Used for diabetes and digestive issues.
en.Trigonella Foenum-graecum (Fenugreek): Improves digestion, lactation, and blood sugar.

ha.Alpinia Galanga (Rasna): Ana amfani da ita wajen warkar da matsalolin numfashi da ciwon jiki.
ha.Amaranthus Viridis (Arive-Dantu): Ana amfani da ita don magance raunuka da kumburi.
ha.Artocarpus Heterophyllus (Jackfruit): Ana amfani da ita wajen maganin ciwon sukari da cututtukan fata.
ha.Azadirachta Indica (Neem): Ana amfani da ita don tsaftace fata da rage zazzabi.
ha.Basella Alba (Basale): Tana da sanyin tasiri; tana taimakawa wajen narkar da abinci.
ha.Brassica Juncea (Indian Mustard): Ana amfani da ita wajen rage ciwon gabobi da tari.
ha.Carissa Carandas (Karanda): Ana amfani da ita don jinƙai, zawo da zazzabi.
ha.Citrus Limon (Lemon): Tana ƙarfafa garkuwar jiki da taimakawa narkewar abinci.
ha.Ficus Auriculata (Roxburgh fig): Ana amfani da ita don rage ciwon sukari da kumburi.
ha.Ficus Religiosa (Peepal Tree): Ana amfani da ita wajen cututtukan fata da numfashi.
ha.Hibiscus Rosa-sinensis: Ana amfani da ita don kara gashi da rage hawan jini.
ha.Jasminum (Jasmine): Ana amfani da ita don rage damuwa da cututtukan fata.
ha.Mangifera Indica (Mango): Ana amfani da ita wajen narkar da abinci da rage zafi.
ha.Mentha (Mint): Tana taimakawa narkewar abinci da sanyaya jiki.
ha.Moringa Oleifera (Drumstick): Tana da sinadirai masu amfani da maganin ƙwayoyin cuta.
ha.Muntingia Calabura (Jamaica Cherry-Gasag: Ana amfani da ita don ciwon kai da tari.
ha.Murraya Koenigii (Curry): Tana taimakawa wajen narkar da abinci da rage ciwon sukari.
ha.Nerium Oleander (Oleander): Ana amfani da ita da kulawa don maganin zuciya.
ha.Nyctanthes Arbor-tristis (Parijata): Ana amfani da ita wajen maganin ciwon gaɓoɓi da zazzabi.
ha.Ocimum Tenuiflorum (Tulsi): Tana ƙarfafa garkuwar jiki da rage damuwa.
ha.Piper Betle (Betel): Ana amfani da ita wajen narkar da abinci da lafiyar baki.
ha.Plectranthus Amboinicus (Mexican Mint): Ana amfani da ita don tari da mura.
ha.Pongamia Pinnata (Indian Beech): Ana shafa ta don maganin cututtukan fata.
ha.Psidium Guajava (Guava): Ana amfani da ita don gudawa da cututtuka.
ha.Punica Granatum (Pomegranate): Tana da sinadirai masu amfani da ƙarfafa zuciya.
ha.Santalum Album (Sandalwood): Ana amfani da ita don fata da maganin fitsari.
ha.Syzygium Cumini (Jamun): Ana amfani da ita wajen rage ciwon sukari da gyaran ciki.
ha.Syzygium Jambos (Rose Apple): Ana amfani da ita wajen zazzabi da gudawa.
ha.Tabernaemontana Divaricata (Crape Jasmin: Ana amfani da ita don rage zafi da kumburi.
ha.Trigonella Foenum-graecum (Fenugreek): Tana taimakawa narkewar abinci da ƙara nono.

yo.Alpinia Galanga (Rasna): A maa nlo fun itoju àìlera mimi ati ìfarapa.
yo.Amaranthus Viridis (Arive-Dantu): Lo fun ìtoju ọgbẹ, ìtẹ ati àìlera mimi.
yo.Artocarpus Heterophyllus (Jackfruit): Lo fun àrùn àtọgbẹ ati àrùn awọ.
yo.Azadirachta Indica (Neem): Lo fun àtọjú awọ ati ìmukuro majele.
yo.Basella Alba (Basale): Lo fun sísọ ara tutu ati iṣan-ara.
yo.Brassica Juncea (Indian Mustard): Lo fun irora egungun ati ìtẹ.
yo.Carissa Carandas (Karanda): Lo fun àìlera oyun, ìbànújẹ ati ìfarapa.
yo.Citrus Limon (Lemon): Múra lara, ràn lọwọ ninu isẹ tito nkan jẹ.
yo.Ficus Religiosa (Peepal Tree): Lo fun àìlera mimi ati àrùn awọ.
yo.Hibiscus Rosa-sinensis: Lo fun irun ati ìdinku titẹ ẹjẹ.
yo.Jasminum (Jasmine): Lo fun ìsinmi ati ìtọjú awọ.
yo.Mangifera Indica (Mango): Lo fun àtọgbẹ ati ìbànújẹ inu.
yo.Mentha (Mint): Ràn lọwọ ninu tito nkan jẹ ati tutu ara.
yo.Moringa Oleifera (Drumstick): O ni ọra to pọ; lo fun àrùn ati ìfarapa.
yo.Muntingia Calabura (Jamaica Cherry-Gasag: Lo fun ìtẹ ati ìrora orí.
yo.Murraya Koenigii (Curry): Lo fun àtọgbẹ ati isẹ tito nkan jẹ.
yo.Nerium Oleander (Oleander): Lo ni pẹlẹpẹlẹ fun àìlera ọkan.
yo.Nyctanthes Arbor-tristis (Parijata): Lo fun àìlera egungun ati ìfarapa.
yo.Ocimum Tenuiflorum (Tulsi): Ràn lọwọ lórí ààrùn ati ìbalẹ.
yo.Piper Betle (Betel): Lo fun isẹ tito nkan jẹ ati ilera ẹnu.
yo.Plectranthus Amboinicus (Mexican Mint): Lo fun ìtẹ ati ìdẹkun imu.
yo.Punica Granatum (Pomegranate): O ni antioxidants, ràn lọwọ lórí ọkan.
yo.Santalum Album (Sandalwood): Lo fun awọ ati àrùn ito.
yo.Syzygium Cumini (Jamun): Lo fun àtọgbẹ ati ìtoju ẹdọ.
yo.Syzygium Jambos (Rose Apple): Lo fun ìtọjú zazzabi ati gudugudu.

ig.Alpinia Galanga (Rasna): Na-enyere aka na nsogbu iku ume na mgbu ahụ.
ig.Amaranthus Viridis (Arive-Dantu): E ji ya eme ọgwụ ọnya na mgbu.
ig.Artocarpus Heterophyllus (Jackfruit): Na-enyere aka na ọrịa shuga na akpụkpọ.
ig.Azadirachta Indica (Neem): Na-enyere aka na akpụkpọ na ihicha ahụ.
ig.Brassica Juncea (Indian Mustard): Na-enyere aka belata mgbu na ikpochapụ ime.
ig.Carissa Carandas (Karanda): E ji ya eme ọgwụ anemia, afọ ọjọọ.
ig.Citrus Limon (Lemon): Na-eme ka ahụ dị ọcha, na-enyere digestion.
ig.Ficus Auriculata (Roxburgh fig): Na-enyere aka na shuga na mgbochi ọrịa.
ig.Ficus Religiosa (Peepal Tree): E ji ya eme ọgwụ asthma na akpụkpọ.
ig.Hibiscus Rosa-sinensis: Na-enyere aka na ntutu isi na mgbali ọbara.
ig.Jasminum (Jasmine): E ji ya eme ọgwụ mmerụ ahụ na ume.
ig.Mangifera Indica (Mango): Na-enyere aka na ọrịa inu na shuga.
ig.Mentha (Mint): Na-enyere na digestion, na-eme ka ahụ dị jụụ.
ig.Muntingia Calabura (Jamaica Cherry-Gasag: E ji ya eme ọgwụ otitis na isi ọwụwa.
ig.Murraya Koenigii (Curry): E ji ya eme ọgwụ shuga na nri.
ig.Nyctanthes Arbor-tristis (Parijata): E ji ya eme ọgwụ mgbu na ịpụ ihe n'ime.
ig.Ocimum Tenuiflorum (Tulsi): Na-enyere gbalịsie ike na mgbochi ọrịa.
ig.Piper Betle (Betel): Na-enyere nri na ahú ike ọnụ.
ig.Psidium Guajava (Guava): Na-enyere na shuga na afọ ọjọọ.
ig.Syzygium Cumini (Jamun): Na-enyere shuga na ịdị ọcha afọ.
ig.Tabernaemontana Divaricata (Crape Jasmin: E ji ya eme ọgwụ mgbu na ọnya.
ig.Trigonella Foenum-graecum (Fenugreek): Na-enyere nri, mmepụta mmiri ara, na shuga.
